# mayoshiny

<!-- badges: start -->
  [![Travis build status](https://travis-ci.org/overdodactyl/mayoshiny.svg?branch=master)](https://travis-ci.org/overdodactyl/mayoshiny)

`mayoshiny` is designed to help create Mayo Clinic based Shiny applications.  Please do not use it for your own work.

## Installation
